name: NSHapticFeedbackManager
desc: An object that provides access to the haptic feedback management attributes on a system with a Force Touch trackpad.

items.name: class var defaultPerformer: NSHapticFeedbackPerformer
items.desc: Requests a haptic feedback performer object that is based on the current input device, accessibility settings, and user preferences.

items.name: enum NSHapticFeedbackManager.FeedbackPattern
items.desc: A pattern of haptic feedback to be provided to the user.

items.name: enum NSHapticFeedbackManager.PerformanceTime
items.desc: A time at which to provide haptic feedback to the user.
